title: Chat during loading screens
body:
Im sure this has been asked before but why havent they implemented chat during loading,

I think it would be a great idea to have teams start formulating plans etc.

replies.body:
to be honest it would be decent, because nobody ever decides on invades etc in the given lobby time, at least not in my division T_T they just flood the chat with one line comments

mid pref
im a mid main
lemme mid
ill carry

and then you have 1 or 2 other people do the same, and they compete with each other for attention just so everybody knows they can spam and it adds max confusion to the lobby
Because people will start flaming at the toasters and hampster wheels before the game even start and end up being a 4v5 game from the very beginning so no, no loading screen chat
